attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MlOG03p39yp1qBZZ9zY_description
attribs.current:
Armor Class (refer to Animal Stat)
Hit Points (refer to Animal Stat)

Locomotion land; For short duration (under an hour) use the Base Speed of the pulling Animal.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MlOG04-62xQ7ml-ea0L_description
attribs.current:
Actions available during vehicle phase if components are operated.

Move: The wagon can move the speed of its Draft Animals using its Draft Animals. 

Turn: The Wagon can be directed to make turns if the Reins are operated.

Using a Bonus Action one can make a successful DC 15 Animal Handling check for the wagon to "Dash" using the Reins.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MlOG0462FgS20AC-eYt_name
attribs.current: Carry Capacity: Refer to Draft Animal

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MlOG0462FgS20AC-eYt_description
attribs.current:
An animal pulling a carriage, cart, chariot, sled, or wagon can move weight up to five times its base carrying Capacity, including the weight of the vehicle. If multiple animals pull the same vehicle, they can add their carrying Capacity together.

*Note: Take the animals Normal Draft and subtract weight of vehicle.*

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MlOG048rNITIP-K02WC_description
attribs.current:
1 Crew 2 Passengers*

*Passengers include Crew of Medium Creatures.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MlOG04KMUoreGZoACri_description
attribs.current:
Fast: 400 ft. /min | 4 miles /hour | 30 miles /day | -5 penalty to passive Wisdom (Perception) scores

Normal: 300 ft./min | 3 miles /hour | 24 miles/ day | no penalty

Slow: 200 ft./min | 2 miles /hour | 18 miles /day | Able to use stealth 

While traveling, a group of Adventurers can move at a normal, fast, or slow pace, as shown on the Travel Pace table. The table states how far the party can move in a period of time and whether the pace has any Effect. A fast pace makes Characters less perceptive, while a slow pace makes it possible to sneak around and to sear⁠ch an area more carefully (see the “Activity While Traveling” later in this section for more information).

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MlOG04Lnwt1BXdXPAxF_description
attribs.current: The vehicle has a yoke to properly attach 1 Draft Animals.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MlOGSInj8GceGYqVnTW_description
attribs.current:
Armor Class 18
Hit Points 15

The Reins include the bit, bridle, and yokes for the pulling animal. When operated they allow the wagon to make turns.

Evasive maneuvers can be accomplished with successful Animal Handling checks defined by the DM.

Using a Bonus Action one can make a successful DC 15 Animal Handling check for the wagon to "Dash"
